comments.text: Per Bug 600838 we should start testing the l10n-check as well. For us we probably need to add the l10n-check target to @topsrcdir@/Makefile.in as a forwarding-to-Mozilla target.
comments.author: bugspam.Callek@gmail.com
comments.creator: bugspam.Callek@gmail.com
